mapper.sql: id, tax_s_name, tax_man, business_license, tax_name, tax_address, tax_create_date, link_man, link_mobile, credit_code, tax_status, create_date, update_date
mapper.select: SELECT t.tax_s_name,t.credit_code,t.tax_address,t.link_mobile,t.bank_code,t.bank_name FROM tb_tax t LEFT JOIN tb_tax_package tp ON tp.tax_id=t.id AND tp.package_status=0 WHERE t.id=#{id}

SELECT ct.id, ct.charge_status, t.tax_name, ct.package_status, ct.service_charge, ct.contract, t.title_of_account as payee, t.bank_name, t.bank_code FROM tb_company_tax as ct LEFT JOIN tb_tax as t ON ct.tax_id = t.id WHERE ct.company_id = #{companyId}

SELECT id,platform_service_provider,company_s_name,if(TRUE,'总包+分包','众包') as type,company_contract,payment_inventory,real_money,payment_order_status,payment_date from tb_payment_order where id in
#{item}

SELECT ct.id, ct.package_status, t.tax_name, t.id as tid, ct.charge_status, ct.service_charge, ct.service_charge as service, ct.contract, t.title_of_account as payee, t.bank_code, t.bank_name, cls.id as cls_id, cls.start_money, cls.end_money, cls.service_charge as clsservice_charge FROM tb_company_info ci INNER JOIN tb_company_tax ct ON ct.company_id = ci.id INNER JOIN tb_tax t ON t.id = ct.tax_id LEFT JOIN tb_company_ladder_service cls ON cls.company_tax_id = ct.id where ci.id=#{companyId}
AND ct.tax_id = #{taxId}
SELECT t.id, t.tax_name, t.credit_code, t.tax_man, t.link_mobile, t.bank_name, t.bank_code, t.create_date, t.tax_status FROM tb_tax t WHERE t.id = #{taxId} ORDER BY t.id
SELECT t.id, t.tax_name FROM tb_tax t LEFT JOIN tb_tax_package tp ON tp.tax_id = t.id WHERE tp.package_status = #{packageStatus}
SELECT t1.bank_name, t1.bank_code, t1.title_of_account FROM tb_tax t1 WHERE t1.id = #{taxId}

SELECT DISTINCT t3.id as company_id, t1.id as tax_id , t1.tax_name, t4.id as merchant_id, t3.company_name, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(real_money) from tb_payment_order where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id AND payment_order_status=6),0) as total_package_money, IFNULL((SELECT SUM(real_money) from tb_payment_order_many where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id AND payment_order_status=3),0) as many_package_money, (SELECT COUNT(id) from tb_payment_order where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id) as total_package_count, (SELECT COUNT(id) from tb_payment_order_many where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id) as many_package_count, 1 as cooperation_state, (SELECT create_date from tb_company_tax WHERE company_id=t3.id AND tax_id=t1.id GROUP BY company_id)as start_cooperation_date, if(DATE_FORMAT((SELECT create_date FROM tb_payment_order where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id ORDER BY create_date desc LIMIT 1), 'MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm:ss') > DATE_FORMAT((SELECT create_date FROM tb_payment_order_many where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id ORDER BY create_date desc LIMIT 1), 'MM-dd-yyyy hh:mm:ss'),(SELECT create_date FROM tb_payment_order where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id ORDER BY create_date desc LIMIT 1),(SELECT create_date FROM tb_payment_order_many where tax_id = t1.id and company_id = t3.id ORDER BY create_date desc LIMIT 1)) as lately_cooperation_date FROM tb_tax t1 INNER JOIN tb_company_tax t2 on t2.tax_id = t1.id INNER JOIN tb_company_info t3 on t3.id = t2.company_id INNER JOIN tb_merchant t4 on t3.id=t4.company_id where t1.id = #{param1}

SELECT id, platform_service_provider, company_s_name, 0 AS cooperate_mode, (real_money + service_money) AS transaction_flow, IFNULL(is_not_invoice, 0) AS is_not_invoice, update_date FROM tb_payment_order WHERE company_id=#{param2} AND tax_id=#{param3} UNION SELECT id, platform_service_provider, company_s_name, 1 AS cooperate_mode, real_money AS transaction_flow, IFNULL(is_not_invoice, 0) AS is_not_invoice, update_date FROM tb_payment_order_many WHERE company_id=#{param2} AND tax_id=#{param3} ORDER BY update_date DESC
